item.title: CVE-2021-24678|2024-08-03T19:42:15.975Z -- unknown -- cm%20tooltip%20glossary%20%E2%80%93%20better%20seo%20and%20uex%20for%20your%20wp%20site
item.description: The CM Tooltip Glossary WordPress plugin before 3.9.21 does not escape some glossary_tooltip shortcode attributes, which could allow users a role as low as Contributor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
